thread.section_title: School Stream - School Communication App Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of School Stream - School Communication App | schoolstream.com.au
thread.title: Kevin Brady
thread.title_full: School Stream - School Communication App reviewed by Kevin Brady

author: Kevin Brady
title: Kevin Brady
text: Once we have learned how to use the app, it is easy and clear to use. The parent feedback has been good and they have engaged with the app. Providing a facility that the school can make available at times for parents to provide ad hoc feedback would be useful. Also, if it was able to run on Windows phones, that would improve the available penetration of the market.
